description: Decreases the number of node groups in a Global datastore.

parameters.name: GlobalReplicationGroupId
parameters.description: The name of the Global datastore.

parameters.name: NodeGroupCount
parameters.description: The number of node groups (shards) that results from the modification of the shard configuration.

parameters.name: GlobalNodeGroupsToRemove
parameters.description: If the value of NodeGroupCount is less than the current number of node groups (shards), then either NodeGroupsToRemove or NodeGroupsToRetain is required. GlobalNodeGroupsToRemove is a list of NodeGroupIds to remove from the cluster. ElastiCache will attempt to remove all node groups listed by GlobalNodeGroupsToRemove from the cluster. (string) ---

parameters.name: GlobalNodeGroupsToRetain
parameters.description: If the value of NodeGroupCount is less than the current number of node groups (shards), then either NodeGroupsToRemove or NodeGroupsToRetain is required. GlobalNodeGroupsToRetain is a list of NodeGroupIds to retain from the cluster. ElastiCache will attempt to retain all node groups listed by GlobalNodeGroupsToRetain from the cluster. (string) ---

parameters.name: ApplyImmediately
parameters.description: Indicates that the shard reconfiguration process begins immediately. At present, the only permitted value for this parameter is true.

nested_items.name: GlobalReplicationGroup
nested_items.description: Consists of a primary cluster that accepts writes and an associated secondary cluster that resides in a different Amazon region. The secondary cluster accepts only reads. The primary cluster automatically replicates updates to the secondary cluster.
